description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共广东省委副书记、广东省人民政府省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He has served as Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and Governor of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任广东省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任广东省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，朱小丹担任广东省省长期间的中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP while Zhu Xiaodan was Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，朱小丹担任广东省省长期间的中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP while Zhu Xiaodan was Governor of Guangdong.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Guangzhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as Secretary of the Guangzhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共广东省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former head of the Propaganda Department of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任中共广东省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as head of the Propaganda Department of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共广东省委统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former head of the United Front Work Department of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任中共广东省委统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as head of the United Front Work Department of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共从化县委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Conghua County Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任中共从化县委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as Secretary of the Conghua County Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替朱小丹担任广东省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹于1953年1月在广东省广州市出生。
description.en: Zhu Xiaodan was born in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province in January 1953.

description.zh-cn: 于1975年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in December 1975.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央党校中青年干部培训班学习。
description.en: Studied at the training program for young and middle-aged cadres at the Central Party School.

degree.zh-cn: 经济管理专业在职研究生

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央党校研究生院经济管理专业学习。
description.en: Studied in the Economic Management program at the Graduate School of the Central Party School.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1984年，任共青团广州市委代书记、书记。
description.en: In 1984, served as acting secretary and then secretary of the Guangzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共从化县委书记。
description.en: Served as Secretary of the CCP Conghua County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共广州市委常委、宣传部部长。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee and Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共广东省委统战部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共广东省委常委、宣传部部长。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee and Head of its Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共广东省委常委、广州市委书记。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee and Secretary of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任广州市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 担任广东省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Served as Executive Vice Governor of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 担任中共广东省委副书记、广东省人民政府代省长、省长。
description.en: Served as Deputy Secretary of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee, and Acting Governor and then Governor of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 当选为中国共产党第十七届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: Was elected as an alternate member of the 17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 当选为中国共产党第十八届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Was elected as a member of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 出任全国人大财经委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Appointed as Vice Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 当选为第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: Elected as a member of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹在担任广东省省长期间，时任中共广东省委书记为汪洋，构成上下级关系。
description.en: While Zhu Xiaodan was Governor of Guangdong, Wang Yang was the Secretary of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee, establishing a subordinate relationship.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹在担任广东省省长期间，时任中共广东省委书记为胡春华，构成上下级关系。
description.en: While Zhu Xiaodan was Governor of Guangdong, Hu Chunhua was the Secretary of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee, establishing a subordinate relationship.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹接替黄华华出任中共广东省委副书记及广东省人民政府代省长。
description.en: Zhu Xiaodan succeeded Huang Huahua as Deputy Secretary of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee and Acting Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 马兴瑞接替朱小丹出任广东省人民政府省长。
description.en: Ma Xingrui succeeded Zhu Xiaodan as Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹接替林树森出任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Zhu Xiaodan succeeded Lin Shusen as Secretary of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹接替黄龙云出任广东省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Zhu Xiaodan succeeded Huang Longyun as Vice Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 朱小丹是广州队的忠实球迷，经常出现在主场赛事主席台上。
description.en: Zhu Xiaodan is a loyal fan of the Guangzhou team and often appears in the presidential box during home games.
